original_text: Can thine heart endure, or can thine hands be strong, in the days that I shall deal with thee? I the Lord have spoken it, and will do it.
korean_text: 내가 네게 보응하는 날에 네 마음이 견디겠느냐 네 손이 힘이 있겠느냐 나 여호와가 말하였으니 내가 이루리라

sentences.original_text: or can thine hands be strong
sentences.korean_translation: 또 네 손이 강할 수 있겠느냐

sentences.original_text: in the days that I shall deal with thee?
I the Lord have spoken it
